entry.title: [MINUTES] Dev Meeting 2017-11-13
entry.summary: The author apologizes for not posting previous meeting minutes and provides a link to access them all in one place. The highlights from the most recent meeting include successful integration tests and an update on c-lightning's progress with handling bitcoin fee updates. Additionally, the group unanimously agreed to include ACINQ's htlckey separation proposal, despite breaking freeze. Future integration tests will now include reconnect tests.Old highlights from October 30th include lnd's Tor addressing support and the group voting in their first optional feature into spec, option-data-loss-protect. Lastly, from October 16th, it was discovered that there was an error in CTLV calculation across routes, but it was resolved through simple specification changes after collaboration.
